name: 1000 days of UDP amplification DDoS attacks
publisher: 2017 APWG Symposium on Electronic Crime Research
description: We analyse the results of running a network of honeypot UDP reflectors (median size 65 nodes) from July 2014 onwards. We explore the life cycle of attacks that use our reflectors, from the scanning phase used to detect our honeypot machines, through to their use in attacks.
